LanguageData.SY_CMB.TooltipCaravanEventActive_MoodEff: Adjust the effect strength for the mood buff received during any caravan event.
LanguageData.SY_CMB.TooltipCaravanTraveling_MoodEffec: Adjust the effect strength for the mood buff received while traveling with a caravan on the world map.
LanguageData.SY_CMB.TooltipCaravanForming_MoodEffect: Adjust the effect strength for the mood buff received while forming a caravan.
LanguageData.SY_CMB.TooltipCaravanEventSuccess_MoodEf: Adjust the effect strength for the mood buff received from successfully completing caravan events.
LanguageData.SY_CMB.TooltipCaravanEventSuccess_Durati: Adjust the effect duration for the mood buff received from successfully completing caravan events.
LanguageData.SY_CMB.TooltipCaravanBattleWon_MoodEffec: Adjust the effect strength for the mood buff received by winning a caravan battle.
LanguageData.SY_CMB.TooltipCaravanBattleWon_DurationD: Adjust the effect duration for the mood buff received by winning a caravan battle.
